page.title: 03Cheadle Market Survey.
page.content: Type of stalls surveyed=Records,Fancy Goods,Bags,Meat,Plants&Flowers,Fruit, Socks, Sweets,Household Goods, ,Material,Cards, Fish, Cheese, Haberdashery, Biscuits,Cakes,Shoes, Wool,Knitwear,Childrenswear,Underwear. No.of Indoor Stalls=13,Outdoor Stalls =19.Most stallholders lived locally & had been coming to the Market for more than 5 yrs.The greatest change that they had noticed in the past few years was that their customers bought less & were far more 'choosy' as they had less money to spend.Most complained that the Market area was not large enough. They would like to see more stalls provided.Customers lived locally & travelled by car,on foot & by bike. They thought that the Market provided good value for money & came regularly. The most popular buy was Fruit & Veg.
